facts.text: Jason Kreis's number 9 was retired by Real Salt Lake in 2011 but was recirculated in 2019 at his request.
Javier Morales's number 11 was retired by Real Salt Lake in 2019.
Real Salt Lake's reserve team, Real Monarchs SLC, was created on September 10, 2014.
Real Monarchs SLC began play in the Western Conference of the United Soccer League during the 2015 season.
Real Monarchs SLC moved to Zions Bank Stadium, a 5,000-seat facility, in 2018.
Real Salt Lake Women was founded in 2008 and competes in the Western Division of United Women's Soccer.
Real Salt Lake added a second women's team in the National Women's Soccer League in November 2017, replacing FC Kansas City.
The new team in the National Women's Soccer League, associated with Real Salt Lake, was unveiled as Utah Royals FC.
Real Salt Lake was founded in 2004 and is based in Sandy, Utah.
The team's head coach as of 2021 is Pablo Mastroeni.
Real Salt Lake competes for the Rocky Mountain Cup against the Colorado Rapids.
Real Salt Lake's victory in the MLS Cup Playoffs Finals occurred in 2009.
The team's former head coaches include Jason Kreis (2007–2013) and Mike Petke (2017–2019).
Real Salt Lake's home field has been America First Field and Rice–Eccles Stadium.
D.C. United won the first MLS Cup in 1996.
Who led the league in assists in the 2008 season with 15 assists? Javier Morales
How many shutouts did Nick Rimando achieve in the 2010 season? 14
Which player won the MLS Cup Most Valuable Player award in 2009? Nick Rimando
Who was named the MLS Young Player of the Year in 2024? Diego Luna
How many goals did Álvaro Saborío score in the 2012 season? 17
In which season did Damir Kreilach score his highest number of goals, tallying 16? 2021
Who achieved the most season MVP awards for the team, with their third award in 2015? Javier Morales
Which player scored a hat-trick against the Columbus Crew on April 2, 2009? Robbie Findley
Who was the top goal scorer in 2024 with 17 goals? Chicho Arango
How many times did Kyle Beckerman win the team's season MVP award? 4 times
